mapper.select: select * from new ORDER BY no DESC limit #{start}, #{viewRow};
select count(*) as tot from new
mapper.insert: insert into new(title, contents, days,picName,picPath, fileName, filePath) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{days},#{picName},#{picPath}, #{name}, #{path})
mapper.select: select m.* , (select no from new where no = (m.`no` - 1)) as re , (select title from new where no = (m.`no` - 1)) as re_title , (select no from new where no = (m.`no` + 1)) as nt , (select title from new where no = (m.`no` + 1)) as nt_title from new as m where m.no= #{newsNo}
mapper.update: update new set title=#{title}, contents=#{content}, days=#{days}, picName=#{picName}, picPath=#{picPath}, fileName=#{name}, filePath=#{path} where no = #{no};
